Apollo Go has partnered with UAE autonomous mobility company AutoGo to jointly announce the official launch of fully driverless commercial operations for the public in Abu Dhabi. This marks Apollo Go’s first time offering a fully driverless ride-hailing service for the public outside China. Local residents and visitors can hail Apollo Go’s fully driverless vehicles through the AutoGo app. The service will initially operate on Yas Island and plans to gradually expand to more areas of Abu Dhabi.
Pilot program concluded after providing nearly one thousand rides.
Europe's first commercial AV deployment in a dense city center; integrated into regular bus Line 16.

Ruter and Holo partner with MOIA to deploy ID. Buzz AD vehicles equipped with Mobileye Drive in Oslo's Groruddalen area; service to transition from existing Nio test fleet to MOIA's turnkey solution by spring 2026.

First production Cybercab (no steering wheel) rolls off the line at Giga Texas; fleet now includes both Model Y and Cybercab units.
